name: Notion Team Wiki Copy Test
description: Testing copy variants (Centralized Knowledge vs. Faster Scaling) for the Notion Team Wiki to optimize sales.

copy.cta: Create Your Single Source of Truth
copy.subtitle: A central wiki to document your team's processes, policies, and knowledge in one organized Notion workspace.
copy.whatsInItForMe: Stop answering the same questions over and over. This wiki becomes your team's single source of truth, saving everyone time.
copy.target_audience: Teams looking to eliminate repetitive questions and centralize company knowledge.
copy.pain_point: Key information is scattered, and team members constantly interrupt each other with repetitive questions.
copy.solution: Our template provides a structured home for all your team's knowledge, making information easy to find and share.

copy.subtitle: The essential team wiki and handbook for onboarding new hires and scaling your company culture.
copy.whatsInItForMe: A good wiki makes onboarding new hires seamless, allowing you to grow your team without the chaos.
copy.target_audience: Growing startups that need to streamline their onboarding process and document their culture.
copy.pain_point: Onboarding new team members is a slow, manual, and inconsistent process that hinders your ability to scale.
copy.solution: This handbook template provides a scalable system for onboarding, ensuring every new hire gets up to speed quickly and consistently.
highlights: Onboard new hires in half the time
